name: Cursor Secrets Setup Guide
description: Configuration guide for setting up Unity Cloud secrets in Cursor account

instructions.setup: Add these secrets to your Cursor account settings
instructions.usage: Scripts will automatically load these secrets using cursor.getSecret()
instructions.fallback: If Cursor secrets are not available, scripts fall back to environment variables

UNITY_PROJECT_ID.usage: Used for API calls to Unity Cloud Services

UNITY_ENV_ID.usage: Specifies which environment to deploy to

UNITY_CLIENT_ID.usage: OAuth client ID for Unity Cloud API authentication

UNITY_CLIENT_SECRET.usage: OAuth client secret for Unity Cloud API authentication

UNITY_API_TOKEN.description: Unity Cloud API Token (alternative to OAuth)

UNITY_EMAIL.usage: Used by Unity CLI for authentication

UNITY_PASSWORD.usage: Used by Unity CLI for authentication

GITHUB_TOKEN.usage: GitHub API operations and repository management

howToSetup.step3: Add each required secret with its value

fallbackBehavior.description: If Cursor secrets are not available, scripts will:
steps: 1. Try to load from Cursor secrets first
4. Log warnings for missing required secrets
